Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item.component

Class CalibreComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aecsocket.calibre.item.component.CalibreComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, CalibreIdentifiable, CalibreItem, CalibreItemSupplier, CalibreLocalized, AcceptsCalibrePlugin, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.Component, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.ComponentHolder<CalibreComponentSlot>, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.item.Item, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable
    public class CalibreComponent
extends Object
implements CalibreItem, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.Component, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.ComponentHolder<CalibreComponentSlot>, AcceptsCalibrePlugin
    A component, which can be nested to create component trees. The building block of an item.

        Loads systems and stats. Mainly for internal use.

      • extendBase

        public void extendBase​(CalibreComponent base)
        Makes this component inherit the same:
        • slots
        • systems
        • stats
        as the provided base. Existing fields will be merged, with the new ones taking precedence. All collections involved are deep cloned. This may be an intensive operation.
        Parameters:
        base - The base component.

      • modifyTree

        public void modifyTree​(ComponentTree tree)
        When creating a tree of components, modifies the tree to this instance's needs, such as adding its stats to the tree.

        In ComponentDescriptor.create(Registry), this method is called breadth-first in the tree, so the root component gets this method called first.

        Parameters:
        tree - The tree.

      • updateItem

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack updateItem​(ItemUser user,
                                                 org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot,
                                                 boolean hidden)
        Sets the item in the equipment slot of the specified entity's inventory to Item.createItem(Player, ItemStack). This retains the stack amount of the old slot.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get items from, and if a PlayerItemUser, to be passed to Item.createItem(Player, ItemStack).
        slot - The equipment slot.
        hidden - If the item should be passed through CalibreItem.setHidden(CalibrePlugin, ItemStack) to improve animations.
        Returns:
        The new item.

      • updateItem

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack updateItem​(ItemUser user,
                                                 org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot,
                                                 Animation animationUsed)
        Sets the item in the equipment slot of the specified entity's inventory to Item.createItem(Player, ItemStack). This retains the stack amount of the old slot.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get items from, and if a PlayerItemUser, to be passed to Item.createItem(Player, ItemStack).
        slot - The equipment slot.
        animationUsed - The animation applied to this item before updating.
        Returns:
        The new item.

      • updateItem

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack updateItem​(ItemUser user,
                                                 org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot)
        Sets the item in the equipment slot of the specified entity's inventory to Item.createItem(Player, ItemStack). This retains the stack amount of the old slot.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get items from, and if a PlayerItemUser, to be passed to Item.createItem(Player, ItemStack).
        slot - The equipment slot.
        Returns:
        The new item.

      • combine

        public CalibreComponentSlot combine​(CalibreComponent other,
                                    boolean limitModification)
        Generic method for combining another component into this component tree. This is achieved by recursively walking through this component's slots and finding one which is:
        1. empty
        2. is compatible
        3. if modification is limited, passes CalibreComponentSlot.canFieldModify()
        then sets the component.
        Parameters:
        other - The component to add on to this.
        limitModification - If a slot has to pass CalibreComponentSlot.canFieldModify().
        Returns:
        The modified slot.

      • combine

        public CalibreComponentSlot combine​(CalibreComponent other)
        Generic method for combining another component into this component tree. This is achieved by recursively walking through this component's slots and finding one which is:
        1. empty
        2. is compatible
        3. modification is limited, passes CalibreComponentSlot.canFieldModify()
        then sets the component. This version does not have limited modification.
        Parameters:
        other - The component to add on to this.
        Returns:
        The modified slot.

      • searchSystems

        public <T> void searchSystems​(SystemSearchOptions<T> options,
                              Predicate<SystemSearchResult<T>> consumer)
        Iterates through all slots, components and systems which match the SystemSearchOptions and runs the consumer on them.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of system to search for.
        Parameters:
        options - The SystemSearchOptions.
        consumer - The action to run for each SystemSearchResult. If returns true, will stop searching.

      • getCompleteLocalizedName

        public String getCompleteLocalizedName​(String locale)
        Gets the localized name of the item in its complete form, looked up in the plugin's locale manager.

        This is defined as CalibreLocalized.getCalibreType().Identifiable.getId().complete.

        Parameters:
        locale - The locale to use.
        Returns:
        The localized name.

      • getCompleteLocalizedName

        public String getCompleteLocalizedName​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Gets the localized name of the item in its complete form, looked up in the plugin's locale manager.

        This is defined as CalibreLocalized.getCalibreType().Identifiable.getId().complete.

        Parameters:
        sender - The command sender to use the locale for.
        Returns:
        The localized name.

public @Nullable String getLongInfo​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Description copied from interface: CalibreIdentifiable
        Gets lines of info used in /calibre info. The string is split by \n to create the line separations. Can be null.

        Parameters:
